origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.analyze_policy_impact', 'description': 'This function analyzes the impact of financial policies on specific industries based on policy documents and financing data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial policy being analyzed.'}, {'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry affected by the policy.'}, {'name': 'dataSources', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'Sources of data for analysis, such as policy files and financing data.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impactAnalysis', 'description': 'A detailed report on the impact of the policy on the industry.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.analyze_policy_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'energy_support', 'industry'是'energy', 'dataSources'是'policy_files'和'financing_data'.
